Title: Register of heroes -- Yan Long
Publisher: Zhongguo qingnian chubanshe (中国青年出版社)
Notes: Yan Long (1960-1979), Dai nationality, was born in Jinghong, Yunnan Province. He joined the People's Liberation Army in 1978. In 1979, he participated in the attack against Vietnam and died in battle.
Theme: Yan LongModels and MartyrsSocialist Spiritual Civilization (1980-2000)Foreign Friends: North Vietnam
